hard: Helios – Ishmael has a built-in critical strike. Whenever Ishmael crits will deal damage which accumulates fast.
Celeste – Denies Ishmael’s healing and turns it to damage to himself.
soft: High armor tanks – Tanks with high armor can be a challenge for Ishmael. Once he kills the enemy’s tank he will destroy the rest of the team. Make sure your tank has a good amount of armor and good healers behind him.
Armor artifact – Ishmael is all about the physical damage. When armor artifact is up he deals a low amount of damage.
